tweets.text: The Shardeloes Lake pollution May/June 2020 in the Misbourne Valley is still unresolved, interesting to analyse the role played by @EnvAgency and HS2. Spreading misleading information successfully shut down public debate. https://t.co/pUXFJAqUNR

@WiseBirding @JohnGale8 @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife That sounds like good news, Chris - well done to you for bringing it to attention and sticking with it, and to Chris Packham for his intervention. And even a (small and qualified) thank you to EA for belatedly and reluctantly seeing sense.
It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

Thank you @MattHancock for supporting my campaign, and the people of #NewcastleUnderLyme, by writing to the @EnvAgency.

As Matt says, it is imperative that the Environment Agency exercise the full range of their regulatory and enforcement powers over the company. https://t.co/lH1na7Cr8A

urls.title: Evidence Synthesis - on demand
urls.description: Evidence Synthesis to inform policy and business decision making Evidence Synthesis - Evidence Review - Systematic Review - Rapid Evidence Assessment - Quick Scoping Review Locations and Dates: Online (self-paced learning in your own time on our learning platform UKCEH LearnWorlds). To help you get a feel for what this online learning would be like, we have put together this video about the basics of our online learning platform, UKCEH LEarnWorlds. (external link to YouTube)   We also offer bespoke training courses at the time of your choice. From 6-20 learners. Please contact Dr. Ingo Schüder on 01491 69 2225 or 07395 845941or UKCEHtraining@ceh.ac.uk to explore further. Cost:  Students: £149 (Use Coupon Code STUDENT) Professionals: £199 For standard student and professional tickets go here for immediate access (external link to UKCEH LearnWorlds) For group and other discounted tickets go here (external link to our Mitingu sign-up and payments platform) For information on the live and

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @scottdegg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 It very much feels like @ClareDinnisEA was sent here last week against her wishes as a PR exercise in the face of national news coverage showing @EnvAgencyMids in a very bad way. The months of hiding away in an ivory tower was the easy option which it looks like she has resumed!
@MickFitz8 @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding It is protected by law.

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 We were all gassed out again last night, it’s needs closing down. You said you have never dealt with anything like this, the only way to deal with it is take there permits off them let us breath and live happily in our homes again

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 If a restaurant served bad food and poisoned people environmental Heath would close them down straight away . This is an environment disaster why are you pussy footing around this . You have the evidence!

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 One of the worst nights ever last night @ClareDinnisEA 
We are literally at the point that if we get it’s any worse or more frequent we will abandon the house & move in with family.This has got to stop @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA I know you must be busy right now at @WalleysL counting the outstanding breaches (clue you only have 10 digits on your hands so best get your shoes & socks off) but it absolutely stinks here. We are eagerly awaiting you engaging with us ASAP.
@StinkStopthe https://t.co/L05ZKwEmf7
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 What went wrong at Christmas that caused this Stench to get so much worse, more frequently? You must be able to determine this surely?

PEOPLE don’t use masking tape it won’t work it’s porous . I’m afraid your probably going to have to go a bit more hardcore. I know the thought of gaffer tape is probably not great but try that over vents . The sticky foam sealant around the window is good too. Might reduce a bit.

@sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe There was drone footage last weekend of the site removing large amounts of plasterboard from the landfill that had recently been tipped ahead of the @EnvAgency visit so this one is a certainty.
